=====================================
    WosBot v1.5.x_BETA - Windows EXE
=====================================

🔧 Windows EXE created by: Stargaterunner
📅 EXE Build: September 2025
🏗️ Original Bot Developer: CamoDev

📋 What's included:
• WosBotAdmin.exe - Recommended launcher (with admin rights)
• WosBot-Admin.bat - Admin batch launcher  
• WosBot-Start.bat - Normal batch launcher
• WosBot.exe - Direct executable
• Complete German & English manuals

🎮 Supported Emulators:
• MuMu Player (Original development)
• MEmu Player (EXE version tested by Stargaterunner) 
• LDPlayer (Available in bot selection)

⚙️ Required Emulator Settings:
• Resolution: 720x1280 (320 DPI)
• Language: English
• Game: Whiteout Survival (English)

🌐 Community & Support:
• Discord: https://discord.gg/Wk6YSr6mUp
• Support Original Developer: https://buymeacoffee.com/cearivera1z

=====================================
        Thank you for using WosBot!
=====================================
